00053 InstanceNode::InstanceNode( SoNode* node )
00054 : m_coinNode( node ), m_parent( 0 )
00055 {
00056 }
00057 
00058 InstanceNode::InstanceNode( const InstanceNode* node )
00059 {
00060    m_coinNode = node->m_coinNode;
00061    node->m_coinNode->ref();
00062    m_parent = node->m_parent;
00063 
00064    for( int index = 0; index < node->children.count(); ++index )
00065    {
00066        InstanceNode* child = new InstanceNode( *(node->children[index]) );
00067        children.append(child);
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00071 InstanceNode::~InstanceNode()
00072 {
00073    qDeleteAll( children );
00074 }
00075 
00079 QString InstanceNode::GetNodeURL() const
00080 {
00081    QString url;
00082    if( GetParent() ) url = GetParent()->GetNodeURL();
00083    url.append( "/" + QString( m_coinNode->getName().getString() ) );
00084    return url;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void InstanceNode::Print( int level ) const
00088 {
00089    for( int i = 0; i < level; ++i ) std::cout << " ";
00090       std::cout << m_coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString()
00091                 << " has " << children.size()
00092                 << " children "<< std::endl;
00093     for( int index = 0; index < children.count(); ++index )
00094         children[index]->Print( level++ );
00095 }
00096 
00100 void InstanceNode::AddChild( InstanceNode* child )
00101 {
00102     children.push_back( child );
00103     child->SetParent( this );
00104 }
00108 void InstanceNode::InsertChild( int row, InstanceNode* instanceChild)
00109 {
00110    if( row > children.size() ) row = children.size();
00111    children.insert( row, instanceChild);
00112    instanceChild->SetParent(this);
00113 }

00116 //bool InstanceNode::Intersect( const Ray& ray, RandomDeviate& rand, InstanceNode** modelNode, Ray* outputRay )
00117 bool InstanceNode::Intersect( const Ray& ray, RandomDeviate& rand, bool* isShapeFront, InstanceNode** modelNode, Ray* outputRay )
00118 {
00119 
00120         //Check if the ray intersects with the BoundingBox
00121    if( !m_bbox.IntersectP(ray) ) return false;
00122    if( !GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00123    {
00124 
00125       bool isOutputRay = false;
00126       double t = ray.maxt;
00127       for( int index = 0; index < children.size(); ++index )
00128       {
00129          InstanceNode* intersectedChild = 0;
00130          Ray childOutputRay;
00131          bool childShapreFront = true;
00132          bool isChildOutputRay = children[index]->Intersect( ray, rand, &childShapreFront, &intersectedChild, &childOutputRay );
00133 
00134          if( ray.maxt < t )
00135          {
00136             t = ray.maxt;
00137             *modelNode = intersectedChild;
00138             *isShapeFront = childShapreFront;
00139 
00140             *outputRay = childOutputRay;
00141             isOutputRay = isChildOutputRay;
00142 
00143          }
00144       }
00145 
00146       return isOutputRay;
00147 
00148    }
00149         else
00150         {
00151                 Ray childCoordinatesRay( m_transformWTO( ray ) );
00152 
00153                 TShape* tshape = 0;
00154                 TMaterial* tmaterial = 0;
00155                 if( children[0]->GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShape::getClassTypeId() ) )
00156                 {
00157                         tshape = static_cast< TShape* >( children[0]->GetNode() );
00158                         if( children.size() > 1 )       tmaterial = static_cast< TMaterial* > ( children[1]->GetNode() );
00159                 }
00160                 else if(  children.count() > 1 )
00161                 {
00162                         tmaterial = static_cast< TMaterial* > ( children[0]->GetNode() );
00163                         tshape = static_cast< TShape* >( children[1]->GetNode() );
00164                 }
00165 
00166                 if( tshape )
00167                 {
00168                          double thit = 0.0;
00169                          DifferentialGeometry dg;
00170                          if( !tshape->Intersect( childCoordinatesRay, &thit, &dg ) ) return false;
00171 
00172                          ray.maxt = thit;
00173                          *modelNode = this;
00174 
00175                          *isShapeFront = dg.shapeFrontSide;
00176 
00177                          if( tmaterial )
00178                          {
00179                                  Ray surfaceOutputRay;
00180                                  if( tmaterial->OutputRay( childCoordinatesRay, &dg, rand, &surfaceOutputRay ) )
00181                                  {
00182                                          *outputRay = m_transformOTW( surfaceOutputRay );
00183                                          return true;
00184                                  }
00185                         }
00186       }
00187    }
00188         return false;
00189 }
00190 
00191 BBox InstanceNode::GetIntersectionBBox()
00192 {
00193         return m_bbox;
00194 }
00195 
00196 Transform InstanceNode::GetIntersectionTransform()
00197 {
00198         return m_transformWTO;
00199 }
00200 
00201 void InstanceNode::SetIntersectionBBox( BBox nodeBBox )
00202 {
00203         m_bbox = nodeBBox;
00204 }
00208 void InstanceNode::SetIntersectionTransform( Transform nodeTransform )
00209 {
00210 
00211         m_transformWTO = nodeTransform;
00212         m_transformOTW = m_transformWTO.GetInverse();
00213 }

00215 QDataStream& operator<< ( QDataStream & s, const InstanceNode& node )
00216 {
00217         s << node.GetNode();
00218         return s;
00219 }

00222 {
00223         s >> node;
00224         return s;

00226 
00227 bool operator==(const InstanceNode& thisNode,const InstanceNode& otherNode)
00228 {
00229         return ( (thisNode.GetNode() == otherNode.GetNode()) &&
00230                          (thisNode.GetParent()->GetNode() == otherNode.GetParent()->GetNode()) );
00231 }
